translation: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: Well, Lady Zero? I was thinking maybe we could{LF}get it on tonight. The game is afoot, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Well, Lady Zero? I was thinking maybe we could{LF}get it on tonight. The game is afoot, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Get it on? Hey, you guys shouldn't fight!{LF}We all need to get along!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Get it on? Hey, you guys shouldn't fight!{LF}We all need to get along!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Worry not, dear dragon.{LF}Zero and I couldn't get along any better when it comes to this!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! Worry not, dear dragon.{LF}Zero and I couldn't get along any better when it comes to this!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Tonight? Meeeeeeh, no. I gotta...wash my hair. {#Name="Zero"}
source: Tonight? Meeeeeeh, no. I gotta...wash my hair. {#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey, Zero! Let me play the get-it-on game too!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, Zero! Let me play the get-it-on game too!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: That's...not a good idea.{#Name="Octa"}
source: That's...not a good idea.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Why not?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why not?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Well, you see, you're a... I mean...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Well, you see, you're a... I mean...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Drop it, Octa.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Drop it, Octa.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Aw, come on! I wanna know!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Aw, come on! I wanna know!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: If we're all friends and stuff, why can't I play{LF}the get-it-on game? Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: If we're all friends and stuff, why can't I play{LF}the get-it-on game? Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Come on, let me! I bet I'd be real good at it!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Come on, let me! I bet I'd be real good at it!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No! And Octa's not playing tonight either.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No! And Octa's not playing tonight either.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But...the burning passion in my loins!{#Name="Octa"}
source: But...the burning passion in my loins!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Just remember, your dear Octa is ready for{LF}full deployment at a moment's notice!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Just remember, your dear Octa is ready for{LF}full deployment at a moment's notice!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Decadus and Octa sure do have a rough time of it.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Decadus and Octa sure do have a rough time of it.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: What?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, they now serve you, Lady Zero, yeees?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well, they now serve you, Lady Zero, yeees?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Which means they're gonna have to kill their own{LF}Intoners at some point...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Which means they're gonna have to kill their own{LF}Intoners at some point...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Uuunnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Uuunnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Oooh. Looks like I hit a nerve there.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oooh. Looks like I hit a nerve there.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: What about your Intoner, Cent?{#Name="Octa"}
source: What about your Intoner, Cent?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Lady Two? Mmmm...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Lady Two? Mmmm...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I'm afraid that's my little secret!{#Name="Cent"}
source: I'm afraid that's my little secret!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: God, I hate this guy. Can't we just kill him?{LF}Like, now? Please?{#Name="Dito"}
source: God, I hate this guy. Can't we just kill him?{LF}Like, now? Please?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I just can't help my devilishly sharp tongue...{#Name="Cent"}
source: I just can't help my devilishly sharp tongue...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: It cuts where it will, even amongst the company of good friends!{#Name="Cent"}
source: It cuts where it will, even amongst the company of good friends!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: So sorry! Ah ha ha ha!{#Name="Cent"}
source: So sorry! Ah ha ha ha!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I gotta say, I wasn't expecting you to stick with me for so long.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I gotta say, I wasn't expecting you to stick with me for so long.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, being free isn't really freedom, is it?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Well, being free isn't really freedom, is it?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Wow. Deep. So deep. My mind, it is blown!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Wow. Deep. So deep. My mind, it is blown!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Shut up before I kill you!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Shut up before I kill you!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Or better yet, just die on your own.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Or better yet, just die on your own.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ...Now, where were we? Oh, right.{LF}Me hanging with you and all that.{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Now, where were we? Oh, right.{LF}Me hanging with you and all that.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Honestly, I don't really care why you're running around{LF}doing all this killing and whatnot.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Honestly, I don't really care why you're running around{LF}doing all this killing and whatnot.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Personally, I'm having the time of my life here!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Personally, I'm having the time of my life here!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I mean, watching you slash and maim and kill all these{LF}ugly bastards? It's like a five-star vacation in Hell!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I mean, watching you slash and maim and kill all these{LF}ugly bastards? It's like a five-star vacation in Hell!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Seriously, I'm loving it. You're the best!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seriously, I'm loving it. You're the best!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I dunno if you can really keep up all this slaughter,{LF}but I sure hope you can!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I dunno if you can really keep up all this slaughter,{LF}but I sure hope you can!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: How are you faring, Lady Zero?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: How are you faring, Lady Zero?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'm fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But...your eye...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: But...your eye...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'm fine, so stop worrying. You're starting to piss me off.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm fine, so stop worrying. You're starting to piss me off.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Unnngh... Your words are...deliciously painful...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Unnngh... Your words are...deliciously painful...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Your flower has grown ever more beautiful.{LF}Frighteningly so...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Your flower has grown ever more beautiful.{LF}Frighteningly so...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Are you really gonna kill all your sisters, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Are you really gonna kill all your sisters, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: That's the plan.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's the plan.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But why? You really want their Intoner powers that bad?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But why? You really want their Intoner powers that bad?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I mean, what are you gonna do with all that power, anyway?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I mean, what are you gonna do with all that power, anyway?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I'm going to end it. I'm going to end it once and for all.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm going to end it. I'm going to end it once and for all.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? What is it?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh? What is it?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I need to tell you something.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I need to tell you something.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uh oh. You sound serious.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Uh oh. You sound serious.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I take it you've noticed your...cravings by now.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I take it you've noticed your...cravings by now.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: ...Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Wh-What do you mean?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Wh-What do you mean?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I know how you look at all of us. Intoners, I mean.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I know how you look at all of us. Intoners, I mean.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No! That's not true! I don't look like that at all!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: No! That's not true! I don't look like that at all!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Don't worry, it's fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't worry, it's fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's just how dragons are made.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's just how dragons are made.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But...but Zero, I...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But...but Zero, I...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Enough talk. It's time.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Enough talk. It's time.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The final battle awaits.{#Name="Zero"}
source: The final battle awaits.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Divergence: Branch D{#Name="Accord"}
source: Divergence: Branch D{#Name="Accord"}

translation: A single decision can change everything.{#Name="Accord"}
source: A single decision can change everything.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: So what do Zero's decisions mean for this world?{#Name="Accord"}
source: So what do Zero's decisions mean for this world?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Will they bring about salvation? Or destruction?{#Name="Accord"}
source: Will they bring about salvation? Or destruction?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: There is one last branch to follow,{#Name="Accord"}
source: There is one last branch to follow,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: and it begins in the Land of Mountains.{#Name="Accord"}
source: and it begins in the Land of Mountains.{#Name="Accord"}
